Lawson says the #MeToo movement that emerged on social media in the wake of the sexual harassment and assault allegations against Hollywood producer Harvey Weinstein has made many people feel empowered to come forward.

At the Rape, Abuse and Incest National Network, or RAINN, services provided to victims were up 25 percent in November compared to last year.
